verses.verse: And<WG2532> after<WG3326> these things<WG5023> I heard<WG191> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456> of many<WG4183> people<WG3793> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>, saying<WG3004>, Alleluia<WG239>; Salvation<WG4991>, and<WG2532> glory<WG1391>, and<WG2532> honor<WG5092>, and<WG2532> power<WG1411>, to the Lord<WG2962> our<WG2257> God<WG2316>:

For<WG3754> true<WG228> and<WG2532> righteous<WG1342> are his<WG846> judgments<WG2920>: for<WG3754> he has judged<WG2919> the great<WG3173> whore<WG4204>, which<WG3748> did corrupt<WG5351> the earth<WG1093> with<WG1722> her<WG846> fornication<WG4202>, and<WG2532> has avenged<WG1556> the blood<WG129> of his<WG846> servants<WG1401> at<WG1537> her<WG846> hand<WG5495>.

And<WG2532> the four<WG5064> and<WG2532> twenty<WG1501> elders<WG4245> and<WG2532> the four<WG5064> animals<WG2226> fell down<WG4098> and<WG2532> worshiped<WG4352> God<WG2316> that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the throne<WG2362>, saying<WG3004>, Amen<WG281>; Alleluia<WG239>.

And<WG2532> I heard<WG191> as it were<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of a great<WG4183> multitude<WG3793>, and<WG2532> as<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of many<WG4183> waters<WG5204>, and<WG2532> as<WG5613> the voice<WG5456> of mighty<WG2478> thunderings<WG1027>, saying<WG3004>, Alleluia<WG239>: for<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> omnipotent<WG3841> reigns<WG936>.

Let us be glad<WG5463> and<WG2532> rejoice<WG21>, and<WG2532> give<WG1325> honor<WG1391> to him<WG846>: for<WG3754> the marriage<WG1062> of the Lamb<WG721> is come<WG2064>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> wife<WG1135> has made<WG2090> herself<WG1438> ready<WG2090>.

And<WG2532> to her<WG846> was granted<WG1325> that<WG2443> she should be arrayed<WG4016> in fine linen<WG1039>, clean<WG2513> and<WG2532> white<WG2986>: for<WG1063> the fine linen<WG1039> is<WG2076> the righteousness<WG1345> of saints<WG40>.

And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> to me<WG3427>, Write<WG1125>, Blessed<WG3107> are they which<WG3588> are called<WG2564> to<WG1519> the marriage<WG1062> supper<WG1173> of the Lamb<WG721>. And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> to me<WG3427>, These<WG3778> are<WG1526> the true<WG228> sayings<WG3056> of God<WG2316>.

And<WG2532> I fell<WG4098> at<WG1715> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> to worship<WG4352> him<WG846>. And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> to me<WG3427>, See<WG3708> you do it not<WG3361>: I am<WG1510> your<WG4675> fellowservant<WG4889>, and<WG2532> of your<WG4675> brothers<WG80> that have<WG2192> the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424>: worship<WG4352> God<WG2316>: for<WG1063> the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424> is<WG2076> the spirit<WG4151> of prophecy<WG4394>.

And<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> heaven<WG3772> opened<WG455>, and<WG2532> behold<WG2400> a white<WG3022> horse<WG2462>; and<WG2532> he that sat<WG2521> upon<WG1909> him<WG846> was called<WG2564> Faithful<WG4103> and<WG2532> True<WG228>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> righteousness<WG1343> he does judge<WG2919> and<WG2532> make war<WG4170>.

<WG1161> His<WG846> eyes<WG3788> were as<WG5613> a flame<WG5395> of fire<WG4442>, and<WG2532> on<WG1909> his<WG846> head<WG2776> were many<WG4183> crowns<WG1238>; and he had<WG2192> a name<WG3686> written<WG1125>, that<WG3739> no man<WG3762> knew<WG1492>, but<WG1508> he himself<WG846>.
And<WG2532> he<WG4016> was clothed with<WG4016> a vesture<WG2440> dipped<WG911> in blood<WG129>: and<WG2532> his<WG846> name<WG3686> is called<WG2564> The Word<WG3056> of God<WG2316>.

And<WG2532> the armies<WG4753> which were in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> followed<WG190> him<WG846> upon<WG1909> white<WG3022> horses<WG2462>, clothed in<WG1746> fine linen<WG1039>, white<WG3022> and<WG2532> clean<WG2513>.

And<WG2532> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750> goes<WG1607> a sharp<WG3691> sword<WG4501>, that<WG2443> with<WG1722> it<WG846> he should strike<WG3960> the nations<WG1484>: and<WG2532> he<WG846> shall rule<WG4165> them<WG846> with<WG1722> a rod<WG4464> of iron<WG4603>: and<WG2532> he<WG846> treads<WG3961> the winepress<WG3025><WG99999> of the fierceness<WG2372> and<WG2532> wrath<WG3709> of Almighty<WG3841> God<WG2316>.

And<WG2532> he has<WG2192> on<WG1909> his vesture<WG2440> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> his<WG846> thigh<WG3382> a name written<WG1125>, KING<WG935> OF KINGS<WG935>, AND<WG2532> LORD<WG2962> OF LORDS<WG2962>.

And<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> an<WG1520> angel<WG32> standing<WG2476> in<WG1722> the sun<WG2246>; and<WG2532> he cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456>, saying<WG3004> to all<WG3956> the birds<WG3732> that fly<WG4072> in<WG1722> the midst of heaven<WG3321>, Come<WG1205> and<WG2532> gather yourselves together<WG4863> to<WG1519> the supper<WG1173> of the great<WG3173> God<WG2316>;

That<WG2443> you may eat<WG5315> the flesh<WG4561> of kings<WG935>, and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of captains<WG5506>, and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of mighty men<WG2478>, and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of horses<WG2462>, and<WG2532> of them that sit<WG2521> on<WG1909> them<WG846>, and<WG2532> the flesh<WG4561> of all<WG3956> men<WG1658>, both free and<WG2532> bond<WG1401>, both<WG2532> small<WG3398> and<WG2532> great<WG3173>.

And<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> the beast<WG2342>, and<WG2532> the kings<WG935> of the earth<WG1093>, and<WG2532> their<WG846> armies<WG4753>, gathered together<WG4863> to make<WG4160> war<WG4171> against<WG3326> him<WG3588> that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the horse<WG2462>, and<WG2532> against<WG3326> his<WG846> army<WG4753>.

And<WG2532> the beast<WG2342> was taken<WG4084>, and<WG2532> with<WG3326> him<WG5127> the false prophet<WG5578> that done<WG4160> miracles<WG4592> before<WG1799> him<WG846>, with<WG1722> which<WG3739> he deceived<WG4105> them that had received<WG2983> the mark<WG5480> of the animal<WG2342>, and<WG2532> them that worshiped<WG4352> his<WG846> image<WG1504>. These both<WG1417> were cast<WG906> alive<WG2198> into<WG1519> a lake<WG3041> of fire<WG4442> burning<WG2545> with<WG1722> brimstone<WG2303>.

And<WG2532> the remnant<WG3062> were slain<WG615> with<WG1722> the sword<WG4501> of him<WG3588> that sat<WG2521> upon<WG1909> the horse<WG2462>, which<WG3588> sword proceeded<WG1607> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750>: and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the birds<WG3732> were filled<WG5526> with<WG1537> their<WG846> flesh<WG4561>.
